33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"The Hour shall not be established until you fight a people whose sandals are made out of hair, and the Hour shall not be established until you fight a people whose faces will look like shields coated with leather

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قِتَالِ التُّرْكِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fighting The Turks
